mapper.insert: insert into groupboard (boardNum, userId, groupName, subject, content) values ( #{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{groupName}, #{subject}, #{content})

insert into groupboardfile (fileNum, boardNum, userId, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) values (groupboardfile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.update: update groupboard set hitCount=hitCount+1 where boardNum = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: select b.boardNum, b.userId, subject, content, hitCount, b.created from groupboard b join member m on b.userId = m.userId where boardNum =#{boardNum}

select tb.* from ( select boardNum, subject from groupboard b join member m on b.userId = m.userId
and (boardNum > #{boardNum})
order by boardNum ASC ) tb where ROWNUM=1

select tb.* from ( select boardNum, subject from groupboard b join member m on b.userId = m.userId
and (boardNum < #{boardNum})
order by boardNum DESC ) tb where ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: insert into groupboardReply (replyNum, boardNum, userId, content,replyAnswer) values (#{replyNum}, #{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{content},#{replyAnswer})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM groupboardReply WHERE boardNum=#{boardNum}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM groupboardReply WHERE boardNum=#{boardNum} AND replyAnswer=0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM groupboardReply WHERE replyNum IN (SELECT replyNum FROM groupboardReply START WITH replyNum=#{replyNum} CONNECT BY PRIOR replyNum = replyAnswer)
mapper.select: SELECT replyNum, boardNum, gbr.userId, content, created , replyAnswer FROM groupboardReply gbr JOIN member m ON gbr.userId=m.userId WHERE replyAnswer=#{replyAnswer} ORDER BY replyNum DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM groupboardReply WHERE replyAnswer=#{replyAnswer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupboardReply(replyNum, userId, boardReplyLike) VALUES (#{replyNum}, #{userId}, #{boardReplyLike})
INSERT INTO groupBoardLike(boardNum, userId, boardLike ) VALUES (#{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{boardLike})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(DECODE(boardLike,1,1)),0) boardikeCount FROM groupBoardLike WHERE boardNum= #{boardNum}
